scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:safe && npm run test:example && npm run style
scripts.test:unit: cd unit && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:example: npm run test:example:multiglob && npm run test:example:failure
scripts.test:example:multiglob: cd example/simple-node && npm test -- test/lib/multi-word-names.js:10 | grep "1\.\.1"
scripts.test:example:failure: cd example/simple-node && npm test | grep 'not ok 9 - "blueIsRed" - test #1 in `test/lib/single-function.js`' && echo 'Good! Above error is expected'
